author: Megan Armstrong
title: Pistons Owner Tom Gores Donates 100K Masks to Detroit's COVID-19 Relief Effort
description: Detroit Pistons  owner Tom Gores has bought 100,000 PPE face masks to be distributed to and used by the people of Detroit during the COVID-19 pandemic, the team  announced  on Monday...
content:
Paul Sancya/Associated Press
Detroit Pistons owner Tom Gores has bought 100,000 PPE face masks to be distributed to and used by the people of Detroit during the COVID-19 pandemic, the team announced on Monday.  
"The surgical-grade masks will be provided to… [+2970 chars]
